title: Data breach at French govt agency exposes info of 10 million people
description: Pôle emploi, France's governmental unemployment registration and financial aid agency, is informing of a data breach that exposed data belonging to 10 million individuals. [...]

title: MSI: Recent wave of Windows blue screens linked to MSI motherboards
description: MSI has officially confirmed the recent surge of blue screens of death (BSODs) encountered by Windows users after installing this week's optional preview updates is linked to some of its motherboard models. [...]

title: Microsoft: Stealthy Flax Typhoon hackers use LOLBins to evade detection
description: Microsoft has identified a new hacking group it now tracks as Flax Typhoon that argets government agencies and education, critical manufacturing, and information technology organizations likely for espionage purposes. [...]

title: ICO calls social media firms to protect people's data from scraping
description: UK's Information Commissioner's Office (ICO), together with eleven data protection and privacy authorities from around the world, have published a statement calling social media platforms to up their protections against data scrapers. [...]

title: Leaseweb is restoring ‘critical’ systems after security breach
description: Leaseweb, one of the world's largest cloud and hosting providers, notified people that it's working on restoring "critical" systems disabled following a recent security breach. [...]

title: Kroll data breach exposes info of FTX, BlockFi, Genesis creditors
description: Multiple reports on social media warn of a data breach at financial and risk advisory company Kroll that resulted in exposing to an unauthorized third-party the personal data of some credit claimants. [...]
